panels.title: Activity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Steps Per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many steps per day were taken?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Flights Climbed per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierFlightsClimbed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many flights of stairs were climbed per day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  sum(hk_value) as "Miles per Day"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierDistanceWalkingRunning'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How far do I walk/run each day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Calories"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBasalEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many calories per day were burned while resting?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Calories"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierActiveEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many active calories were used per day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Exercise Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleExerciseTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend exercising each day?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Stand Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleStandTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend standing each day?
Body Measurements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Lean Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierLeanBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Fat %"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyFatPercentage'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much do I weigh?

targets.rawSql:

  hk_value as "BMI"

WHERE

AND

ORDER BY time

panels.title: How fast do I travel on stairs?

list.definition:
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_quantity_record
UNION
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_category_record
ORDER BY hk_source
list.description: The source/device the data came from.
list.label: source
list.name: source
list.query:
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_quantity_record
UNION
SELECT distinct(hk_source)
FROM hk_category_record
ORDER BY hk_source
